name: Disney Bolt
description: In Disney's Bolt, players take on the heroic personas of the TV star dog, Bolt, and his owner, Penny, from the high-action television series featured within the film.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 3500+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB 3D Video Card w/Shader Model 3.0 Support Sound Card: 16-bit DirectXÂ® 9.0c-compatible sound card Additional Notes: Recommended peripheral: Keyboard & Mouse

reviews.review_text: A game that is just a while. Around 4 hours of gameplay and the game ends. It is a fun game, but not worth as $20. Buy this during winter sale!
